channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Tinysvcmdns
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Tinysvcmdns

item.title: CVE-2017-12130|2024-08-05T18:28:16.564Z -- talos -- tinysvcmdns
item.description: An exploitable NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the tinysvcmdns library version 2017-11-05. A specially crafted packet can make the library dereference a NULL pointer leading to a server crash and denial of service. An attacker needs to send a DNS query to trigger this vulnerability.
